llm_res.rule: The `transferFrom` function should throw unless the `_from` account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
Transfers _value amount of tokens to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event.
The `allowance` function should return the amount which `_spender` is still allowed to withdraw from `_owner`.
